name: NSBitmapImageRep.Format
desc: Constants that represent bitmap component formats.

items.name: static var alphaFirst: NSBitmapImageRep.Format
items.desc: A format where the alpha value comes first.

items.name: static var alphaNonpremultiplied: NSBitmapImageRep.Format
items.desc: A format where alpha values are not premultiplied.

items.name: static var floatingPointSamples: NSBitmapImageRep.Format
items.desc: A format where samples are specified using floating-point numbers.

items.name: init(rawValue: UInt)
items.desc: Creates a new instance with the specified raw value.
